de.tuberlin.dima.bdapro.dataIntegration.sensor.workflows

Class SensorFeatureTableGeneration

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.tuberlin.dima.bdapro.dataIntegration.sensor.workflows.UnifiedSensorWorkflow
      • de.tuberlin.dima.bdapro.dataIntegration.sensor.workflows.SensorFeatureTableGeneration

  • public class SensorFeatureTableGeneration
extends UnifiedSensorWorkflow
    Flink workflow that creates the feature table for the sensor data by filtering and aggregating the sensor data.

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
                 throws java.lang.Exception
        Aggregates the filtered dataset for all sensor data in "data_directory" into windows of 'window_size_in_minutes' minutes and stores it in a combined csv file.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • generateFeatureTable

        public static FeatureTable generateFeatureTable(boolean useCached,
                                                org.apache.flink.api.java.ExecutionEnvironment env,
                                                java.lang.String dataDirectory,
                                                int windowInMinutes,
                                                org.apache.flink.table.api.java.BatchTableEnvironment batchTableEnvironment)
        Generates a FeatureTable by aggregating filtered sensor data into windows of the specified size. The filtered data is loaded from precalculated files.

        Developer note: While this method uses stored data to avoid repeated processing of the large raw data, the extension to using raw data is trivial.

        Parameters:
        useCached - Whether or not to load prefiltered data from file or load raw data and apply filtering directly.
        env - An execution environment to use.
        dataDirectory - The base path of the data directory.
        windowInMinutes - The size of the aggregation window.
        batchTableEnvironment - A table environment to use.
        Returns:
        the feature table generated by aggregating the filtered sensor data.

      • storeAggregatedSensorData

        public static void storeAggregatedSensorData(org.apache.flink.table.api.Table aggregates,
                                             java.lang.String dataDirectory,
                                             int windowInMinutes,
                                             org.apache.flink.table.api.java.BatchTableEnvironment tEnv)
        Stores the given aggregated data into a csv file.
        Parameters:
        aggregates - The aggregated dataset to store.
        dataDirectory - The base path of the data directory.
        windowInMinutes - The window size of the aggregated data used for file naming.
        tEnv - The table environment to use.

      • aggregateSensorData

        public static org.apache.flink.table.api.Table aggregateSensorData(boolean useCached,
                                                                   java.lang.String dataDirectory,
                                                                   int windowInMinutes,
                                                                   org.apache.flink.api.java.ExecutionEnvironment env,
                                                                   org.apache.flink.table.api.java.BatchTableEnvironment tEnv)
        Aggregates sensor data filtered by SensorFiltering by the given window size and returns the result.
        Parameters:
        useCached - Whether or not to load prefiltered data from file or load raw data and apply filtering directly.
        dataDirectory - The base path of the data directory.
        windowInMinutes - The size of the aggregation window in minutes.
        env - An execution environment to use.
        tEnv - A table environment to use.
        Returns:
        the aggregated sensor data.

      • aggregateSensorData

        public static org.apache.flink.table.api.Table aggregateSensorData(org.apache.flink.api.java.DataSet<UnifiedSensorReading> sensorReadings,
                                                                   int windowInMinutes,
                                                                   org.apache.flink.api.java.ExecutionEnvironment env,
                                                                   org.apache.flink.table.api.java.BatchTableEnvironment tEnv)
        Aggregates the given sensor dataset by the given window size and returns the result.
        Parameters:
        sensorReadings - The sensor data to aggregate.
        windowInMinutes - The size of the aggregation window in minutes.
        env - An execution environment to use.
        tEnv - A table environment to use.
        Returns:
        the aggregated sensor data.
